title: ImportError: libcudart.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
body_html:
When I import torch, I get: "ImportError: libcudart.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"

I downloaded pytorch through anaconda, using

conda install -c pytorch pytorch

Then, i tried

conda uninstall pytorch
conda install pytorch cuda90 -c pytorch

Same error.

I also tried creating a libcudart.so.9.0 symlink to the libcudart.so.9.2 file I had in my Anaconda package, in which case I get the error

ImportError: /home/paperspace/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/../../../libcudart.so.9.0: version `libcudart.so.9.0' not found (required by /home/paperspace/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
